reviewText:
This is another vintage gem from the creator of Cutey Honey and devilman,it's action packed,sexy and crazy as Nagai's stuff usually goes,but..it ended a bit too soon towards the end,I was expecting a much bigger lead-up towards the end,but instead we're left with a lot of loose ends in this which were sadly never answered,it could've used a sequel,but ah well,it's still worth a watch,and that's a fact with this one shot.

So check it out,if you like go nagai based anime.
